Key Match Events: Evin Lewis scored 102 runs off 61 balls to lead West Indies to a win
Sherfane Rutherford scored 50 runs off 26 balls in a crucial partnership with Evin Lewis
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka was given the player of the series award
Evin Lewis was given the man of the match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium
Sri Lanka won the T20 and ODI series against West Indies
